step1Desc: Select your birds and quantity on our website. It is very fast.
step2Desc: Pay a small fee to secure your slot in the queue.
step3Desc: We confirm your payment within a few minutes.
step4Desc: Our manager will call you within 5 minutes to discuss pick-up.
step5Desc: Your chicks are allocated to the nearest agent close to you. Pick up and start rearing!
heroTitle: Buy Chicks. Rear Them. Sell Back. Make Profit.
heroSubtitle: Start small. Grow fast. We sell healthy day-old chicks. You rear them. We buy them back at a good price. No stress. No market struggle.
problemTitle: Many people rear chicken very well...
problemDesc: They buy feed, treat sickness, and take care day and night. But when birds mature, they don't know where to sell fast. Buyers delay, prices are low, and the market is stressful. That is the problem we solve.
solutionDesc: We sell strong healthy chicks, good feed, and quality tools. We guide you every step and buy back your mature birds for hotels and restaurants. We understand this business because we are inside it.
challengesSubtitle: And our easy solutions for you.
solFeed: We guide you on proper feeding systems to reduce waste.
solSickness: We advise on basic medication and hygiene to keep them healthy.
solMarket: We buy back your birds at a very fair price.
solTools: We sell high-quality feeders and drinkers (tools).
solCare: We guide you step-by-step. You are not alone in this.
agentDesc: Anyone can register. Earn ₦50 – ₦100 per chick you sell. No farm or capital needed. Just connect buyers and earn easy money.
trustDesc: Booking fee secures your slot. Allocation is fast. Nearest agent is provided. Clear communication. Real poultry business. No hidden stories.
footerSlogan: Simple poultry business. Real profit opportunity.
sellToUsDesc: Have mature birds ready? No buyer? Need fast cash? We buy at a good price. Contact us directly. Fast response. No long story.
searchPlaceholder: Search by phone, name, or booking ID...
